Name: PRO DRIFT RELOADED 2020
About the game: NOTE: This game is best experienced with a racing wheel. The handbrake must be used for drifting. (Space) The Update contains the following: Featuring Drift Events! (Circuit Events, Quick Events, Point Targeted Events and more) 10 NEW Tracks + Open World. 5 Extra Free Cars Available In The Update. New Wheels. Updated Textures Lighting Improvements Vehicle Physics Improved. Car Modification Updated. Description * 100% Development support. * Full Controller Support except for the Launcher Vehicles feature many body upgrades and tuning options for players to build custom rides. fully tune-able physics to allow players to choose their unique drift builds. An entire city including off-road trails and drift tracks. Vehicle features: Incredible vehicle graphics. Fully customisation body mods. Build settings for vehicles allowing changes to Engines, Air filter, Battery, Gearbox, Fuel tank and more. Stunning colours for vehicle body and wheels and tyre smoke. Full physics control allowing drift adaptation. Hydraulics for all vehicles. Suspension and wheel position tuning. Graphical Features Completely dynamic city. Stunning graphics designed to attract all dynamic lighting towards vehicles. Camera Angles to fit different players preferences. Reflective roads/paths and other areas throughout the map providing a realistic but colourful design, unique for the set purpose. Vehicle physics react to various areas throughout the map such as speed bumps, grass, track racing etc.. Colourful map designed to bring uniqueness to a drift game. Game-play Features Full Controller/Wheel Support and remapping. Unique drift physics bringing an entirely new experience. Smoking streets providing players with the real drift effect. Fast and Easy UI designs. Options provided to reduce game quality settings to fit various systems. All images provided are actual in-game footage*
